https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xKoXpgqEk8RSezV05oRDCZP9fhT.jpg An unidentified man posts a live feed on social media showing that he has kidnapped two strangers and intends to kill one before the day is out. His intention is to hold a capital 'trial' online. As the authorities recognize what's happening, it becomes apparent that the online public is going to act as judge and jury. American Hangman
